sentences.sContent: I to the kindergarten at the age of three.
sentences.sContent_eng: I to the kindergarten at the age of three.
sentences.sCn: 在我记忆中，我三岁就被送去幼儿园了。

sentences.sContent: She took me to the kindergarten and home every day, in spite of rain and wind.
sentences.sContent_eng: She took me to the kindergarten and home every day, in spite of rain and wind.
sentences.sCn: 无论是下雨还是刮风，她每天带我在幼儿园和家之间穿梭。

remMethod.val: kind(看作kid， 孩子) +er+garten (看作garden， 乐园) →孩子的乐园→幼儿园

words.tran: 幼儿园教师；幼儿园里的小孩

trans.tranOther: a school for children aged two to five
